QuestData.Title: A Damned Pact
QuestData.Description:
Yes... I begin to remember. Power. Power with a purpose. That is what I can offer.
Runes. Runes are the key. I've recalled some of them, but to infuse them into your equipment, I require my hands.
Well, one hand would suffice. Both would be better.
Find a way to free me from my bonds, mortal. Then I can offer the power you seek. After that, freedom... and perhaps the downfall of the one who bound me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Discover a way to break the Runecarver free from his chains.
QuestData.RewardText: Breaking a prisoner's chains? I'm not sure I know how that could be done, unless...$b$bIt's dangerous, but I believe there may be a way.
